title: [Atoll, Ivory Path]
description: Ivory blocks are stacked up around a grotto to form a provisional wall.  Tall tropical trees with far-reaching fronds offer shade throughout the area.  Dark and ominous, the ocean waters crash against the shore, and jagged rocks break the sea's surface in sharp, pointed clusters.

Ivory blocks are stacked up around a grotto to form a makeshift wall.  Tall tropical trees with far-reaching fronds offer shade for those nearby, the ocean waters dark and ominous with jagged rocks protruding from the surface.
